rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment provides factual description of scale/outcome ('Thousands of birds are understood to have been culled') using a neutral verb ('culled').
The segment uses the containment verb 'have been culled'. Neutral even with a large number.
The segment reports the number of birds culled, lacking explicit calming language.
The segment mentions 'Thousands of birds' but not with a minimiser to downplay it.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Reports birds culled ("Thousands of birds are understood to have been culled") without active reassurance.
